short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Undertale Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Undertale background. Undertale wallpaper background theme for game fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Undertale wallpapers each time a new tab is opened.
2. Customize your Undertale background by randomizing it or saving favorites in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media platforms.
5. Automatically display the current date and time.
6. New note feature to jot down your tasks.
7. Streamlined access to your most frequently visited websites.
8. Simplified access to your bookmarked pages.
9. Shortcut panel addition for rapid website access.
10. Instant access to Google applications.
11. Quick link to explore more themes.
12. Effortless sharing options to social networks.
13. Fast access to download new wallpapers.
14. One-click access to gaming.
15. Activate engaging animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your Undertale new tab.
